General.Name: Sino-i Technology Limited
General.Description: Sino-i Technology Limited, an investment holding company, provides corporate IT application services to small and medium enterprises in the People's Republic of China. It also offers SaaS mode e-commerce and informational application services, such as Website development, B2C, corporate email, e-sales and promotions, etc.; Internet services, including domain name registration, virtual main frame, and self-service Website services, etc. In addition, the company provides IT sub-contracting services. Sino-i Technology Limited offers its e-commerce and informational application services directly through its branch offices; and Internet services through online direct sales and agents. The company is headquartered in Beijing, People's Republic of China. Sino-i Technology Limited is a subsidiary of Nan Hai Corporation Limited.

3.Name: Mr. Ming King  Chiu FCIS, FCS
3.Title: Company Sec.
